full_summary:
.Request for Proposal (RFP) - Forklift Truck Acquisition
================================]==
### Title
Rough Terrain, All-Wheel Drive & All-Wheel Steering, Diesel Engine Driven, Sit-Down Rider Type Forklift Trucks

### Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-209-42444010
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-226593/B
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-08 at 14:00

### Acquisition Information
* **Procurement Category**: Government Departments (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others

### Description of Goods and Services
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to procure one (1) Rough terrain, all-wheel drive & all-wheel steering, diesel engine driven, sit-down rider type forklift truck for delivery to CFB Bagotville, QC. The requested delivery date is 270 days after receipt of order (ARO). An option for two (2) Rough terrain, all-wheel drive & all-wheel steering, diesel engine driven, sit-down rider type forklift truck is included for delivery within Canada. The requirement includes electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The documents include the solicitation notice and all attachments.

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence Headquarters
* **Contact Person**: Dong Le
* **Email**: [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (999) 999-9999
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

The key information has been distilled into a clear and concise format, while maintaining all relevant details.
